archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0782
archimate:Requirement.documentation: Provide a single digital journey for the customer and a VF front/back office representative, i.e. the same journey to facilitate a simplified experience, additionally provide a CRM “under the hood” capability to front/back office representatives where complex transaction are required, examples: escalated discounts, manipulating billing start date and other field values that require changes.

properties.value: spectate or Agent Portal modelled after SC / DS views

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
